The activity of inhibiting PAI-1 production of the compound of the present invention was expressed in terms of the IC50 value and shown in Table 2.
TABLE 2PAI-1 production-inhibitingCompound No.activity, IC50(μM)114.1216.835.848.4124.01623.2
To C57BL/6 mice (6-week-old, female), bleomycin hydrochloride (Bleo: NIPPON KAYAKU CO., LTD) (6 mg/kg, 25 μl/animal) was injected into the bronchus together with 500 μl of compressed air, 0.3 mg/kg of the test substance was suspended in 0.5% carboxymethyl cellulose sodium, and orally administered once daily, 10 μM TGF-β was added thereto and incubated for 24 hours.
